backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required Android APK dialog updates and associated files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for reference.
frontend/ANDROID_APK.md: Guide explaining how to build, sign, and distribute a TWA-based universal Android APK using Bubblewrap.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color variables, dark mode values, and base typography.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, manifest, and main React script.
frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5: IC asset canister config defining cache headers, especially no-cache rules for APK downloads.
frontend/public/downloads/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the downloads directory exists in version control.
frontend/public/downloads/app.apk: Empty placeholder for the hosted Android APK file.
frontend/public/downloads/README.md: Instructions for hosting universal APKs and expected behavior when no APK is present.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and launch behavior.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker providing caching, offline fallbacks, and explicit no-cache behavior for APK downloads.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application implementing dashboard layout, credential CRUD flow, filtering, pagination, and APK dialog handling.
frontend/src/components/apk/AndroidApkDi: Dialog component that checks APK availability and integrity, displays status, and allows copying or downloading the APK URL and checksum.
frontend/src/components/apk/AndroidApkIn: Scrollable guide outlining steps and prerequisites for generating an Android APK using Bubblewrap and TWA.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Badg: Popover-based multi-select widget that displays selected options as removable badges.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Copy: Button that copies a given text to the clipboard and shows success feedback.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Cred: UI controls for filtering credentials by category, range, and branch with clear buttons.
Modal form for adding or editing credential records, including category, details, and multi-select fields.
Search input field for filtering credential entries by text.
Table displaying credential records with badges, copy actions, and edit/delete controls.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Dele: Displays a confirmation dialog for deleting a credential with cancel and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Empt: Renders an empty-state UI prompting the user to add their first credential.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Pagi: Provides pagination controls including navigation buttons and page-size selection.
frontend/src/components/credentials/Pass: Shows a password field with toggleable visibility.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/PageTi: Displays the page title and subtitle for the credential management dashboard.
frontend/src/components/layout/FixedFoot: Renders a fixed footer with a confidentiality notice and optional APK download button.
frontend/src/components/layout/StickyHea: Renders a sticky header with branding text and a theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: Provides a button to toggle between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/components/print/PrintButto: Renders a button that triggers window printing of credential data.
frontend/src/constants/credentialOptions: Exports constant option lists for ranges, branches, and credential categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useApkAvailability.ts: Checks availability and validity of a hosted APK file and returns status and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useApkIntegrity.ts: Fetches APK metadata and provides a method to calculate its SHA-256 checksum.
frontend/src/hooks/useCredentialFilterin: Manages search and filter state for credentials and returns filtered results.
frontend/src/hooks/useCredentials.ts: Loads, stores, and manages credential records with add, update, and delete operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient setup with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePagination.ts: Provides a pagination hook that manages current page, page size, and returns a sliced subset of data with computed totals. Automatically resets page when data size changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state synced with localStorage and applies the theme class to the document root. Exposes a toggle function.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode overrides, utility classes, print styles, table styles, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global styles.
Handles saving and loading credential objects to and from localStorage with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/types/credentials.ts: Defines the Credential data model and a form data type omitting auto-generated fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, theme extensions, custom colors, radii, typography, and animations. Enables typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state, existing features, and pending requests focused on improving APK download handling and validation.
